item.description:
Come for an extra ASL Meetup on Monday Sept. 3rd from 12:00-2:00pm in the first floor food court of the MIT Stratton Student Center on 84 Mass Ave., Cambridge.  If you're coming from Cambridge, or walking from the Central Square T stop, it will be on the right hand side of Mass Ave.
Here is a link to the Stratton Student Center: http://studentlife.mit.edu/cac/student-center

It is building W20 on this map: http://whereis.mit.edu/

The closest mbta station is Central Square, but it is walking distance from either the Central Square or Kendall stops.

  • We'll meet in the food court on the first floor at 12 noon.
  • There are a variety of food vendors if people want to buy lunch, but it's also OK  to bring your own brown bag lunches.
  • There should be enough seating inside, but if not, there are several options for seating nearby outside (picnic tables, benches, a lawn, the steps wrapping around the entrance).

Please enjoy the sun, the day off, and some ASL!
item.name: Labor Day Monday Boston ASL Meetup!
